channel.title: Monty Python & Famous Historian
channel.description: Who killed the famous historian in monty python and the holy grail?

item.title: Go & Python performance test
item.dc:creator: Vahid Mardani
item.description:
Consider this pseudo code:

async def worker(worker_idx, iterations):
    result, o = 0, iterations * worker_idx
    for i in range(o):
        result += i**i
    for i in range(o):
        result -= i**i

await wait([worker(i, 600) for i in range(10)])
